citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:19am on
07-Nov-17.
Called several times and knocked on door.
Additional Inspectors
Brunkhorst Susanne, Veterinary Medical Officer
